mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_HIDE = 'N'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, BOARD_COUNT, TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "BOARD_DATE" FROM BOARD JOIN "MEMBER" m USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_HIDE = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "BOARD_DATE", BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_HIDE = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} - 1 UNION ALL SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} + 1
